## Address.Zero() method

Creates the Zero address (the one that should be used when deploying smart contracts). Generally speaking, this should not be used by client code (internal use only).

**Signature:**

```typescript
static Zero(): Address;
```
**Returns:**

[Address](./sdk-core.address.md)
